column2: b'@bizalmanac @TSOH_Investing It\xe2\x80\x99s not as complicated as $CLNY !'

b'Interesting write up, only \xe2\x80\x9cquibble\xe2\x80\x9d is that the arithmetic for the option value overvalues it by a factor of 4x.

Summing up three years of EBITDA/FRE + terminal value and then capitalizing at a 20x multiple is some 2020 math.

b"Of note, 

1) Colony paid for Digital Bridge 1/3 in shares so the true purchase price will fluctuate with $CLNY stock price

2) Digital Bridge now manages $23B AUM and projects doubling that amount in three years, lowering both Colony and Wafra's multiple paid"

b"Buying low and selling high - 

in 07/2019, Colony, $CLNY, paid $325mm for Digital Bridge, the fund-less sponsor now managing Colony's investments, and their $20B of AUM

$325mm/$20,000mm = 1.6% multiple. Cheap!

And then a year later sold 30% to Wafra for 2.3x higher multiple https://t.co/DRUmJ5bpwf"
